name: Cat & Caro
description:
Cat & Caro is a short visual novel featuring a melancholic atmosphere. The story follows a girl who is drifting away from her friends, and at her lowest moment she has a chance encounter with a stray cat, who is cold at first, but might have a warm heart underneath. Features art and music!!

Credits:

Ruby Catmire - Malicious spirits
Ivy Smitts - Secret techniques
E - Additional music
